channel.title: ginza on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in ginza on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Ginza street is blocked to cars on Sundays
item.description: 13:52 Sunday 12 July 2015 JST After getting my computer, I walked up and down the street which had a few umbrella tables and lots of shoppers instead of cars. It seemed like a good thing to post on Periscope, so I did. https://twitter.com/thunderrabbit/status/620084902663356416
